thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Yongtai Technology Cuts Stake In Jiangxi Fushine Pharmaceutical

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Yongtai Technology Cuts Stake In Jiangxi Fushine Pharmaceutical

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang yongtai technology co ltd

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Yongtai Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT HAS SOLD ABOUT A TOTAL OF 1.0 PERCENT STAKE IN JIANGXI FUSHINE PHARMACEUTICAL CO LTD FOR 51.7 MILLION YUAN ($8.16 million) ON MARCH 1, 2 AND 6 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2I6eARJ Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3386 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
